column2: select top # run1, run2    from Pairs p     join PhotoTag t1 on t1.ObjID=p.ObjID1     join PhotoTag t2 on t2.ObjID=p.ObjID2        and t1.type=t2.type        and t1.psfMag_r between t2.psfMag_r - # and t2.psfMag_r + #   where t1.type=# -- stars ) select Dist = dbo.fDistanceXYZ(t1.cx,t1.cy,t1.cz, t2.cx,t2,cy,t2.cz) from p
